text: Little Big Man is the debut solo studio album by American rapper Bushwick Bill of the Geto Boys. It was released on September 8, 1992 through Rap-A-Lot Records. Recording session took place at Digital Services in Houston. Production was handled by John Bido and J. Prince with co-producers Crazy C, Roland, Goldfingers and Mike Dean. It features guest appearances from Ganksta N-I-P and MC L. The album peaked at number 32 on the Billboard 200 and number 15 on the Top R&B;/Hip-Hop Albums chart in the United States. == Track listing == ==Personnel== *Richard Stephen Shaw – main artist *Lewayne Williams – featured artist (track 5) *Linc "MC L" Vanderhorst – featured artist (track 11) *John Okuribido – producer, mixing, mastering *James H.
